duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the F&B Director in overseeing day-to-day operations including casual, fine dining, private events, and bartending operations.
Coordinate with the Member Experience Director, the Event Sales Director, and event hosts to ensure that all events are well-organized and that the expectations of Members and hosts are exceeded.
Effectively communicate with Department Heads and Employees to execute a high level of service at all times.
Manage, train, and create an engaging atmosphere for Employees.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management or related field (preferred)
